verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: When] [ARG1: Spencer Wagner] [V: became] [ARG2: Donald Trump 's bodyguard] , he probably thought he was onto a good thing . But an incident with Trump 's then - wife Maria Maples would end in scandal for them both .
